```lua

-- Services --
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ServerScriptService = game:GetService("ServerScriptService")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")

-- Configuration --
local GAME_NAME = "Roblox Luau"
local MAX_PLAYERS = 10

-- Game State --
local gameState = {}
gameState.players = {} -- player data (uid, name, score)
gameState.rounds = {} -- round data (number, start_time, end_time, winner_uid)
gameState.currentRound = 1

-- Util Functions --
local function getUidFromPlayer(player)
    return player.UserId.ToString()
end

local function getPlayerData(uid)
    for _, v in pairs(gameState.players) do 
        if v.uid == uid then return v end 
    end 
    return nil 
end 

local function updateScoreboard()
    local scoreboard = game.Workspace.Scoreboard.SurfaceGui.ScoreboardFrame.List    
    scoreboard:ClearAllChildren() 
    for _, v in pairs(gameState.players) do 
        local playerName = v.name 
        local score = v.score 
        local listItem = Instance.new("TextLabel")        
        listItem.Text = tostring(score).. " - ".. playerName 
        listItem.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 30) 
        listItem.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, #scoreboard:GetChildren() * 30)        
        listItem.Parent = scoreboard 
    end 
end 

-- Round Management --
local function startNewRound()
    local startTime = tick()
    local roundNumber = gameState.currentRound    
    table.insert(gameState.rounds, { number = roundNumber, start_time = startTime, end_time = startTime + 60 }) 
    print("Starting new round ".. roundNumber.. "!

Here is an advanced Roblox Lua script for a Luau-themed game, a beachside festival with various activities:
```lua

-- // SERVICES \\ --

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local Workspace = game:GetService("Workspace")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local ServerScriptService = game:GetService("ServerScriptService")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")

-- // VARIABLES \\ --

local LuauIsland = Workspace.LuauIsland -- The main island model

local CoconutTrees = {} -- Table to store coconut tree objects

local HulaDancers = {} -- Table to store hula dancer characters

local LeiStands = {} -- Table to store lei stand objects

local FirePit = LuauIsland.FirePit -- The fire pit object

local TotalCoconuts = 100 -- Total number of coconuts available

local CoconutsPerPlayer = 5 -- Number of coconuts each player can collect

local Scoreboard = ReplicatedStorage.Scoreboard -- The scoreboard object

-- // FUNCTIONS \\ --

local function SpawnCoconutTree()
    local coconutTree = Instance.new("Part")
    coconutTree.Name = "CoconutTree"
    coconutTree.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
    coconutTree.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 0, math.random(-50, 50))
    coconutTree.Anchored = true
    
    -- Add a coconut fruit to the tree    
    local coconutFruit = Instance.new("MeshPart")
    coconutFruit.MeshId = "rbxassetid://123456789" -- Replace with your mesh ID    
    coconutFruit.Parent = coconutTree
    
    table.insert(CoconutTrees, coconutTree)
end

local function SpawnHulaDancer()
    local hulaDancer = Instance.new("Model")
    hulaDancer.Name = "HulaDancer"
    hulaDancer:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(LuauIsland.HulaStage.CFrame)
    
    -- Add dance animations to the hula dancer    
    local anim = Instance.new("Animation")
    anim.AnimationId = "rbxassetid://987654321" -- Replace with your animation ID    
    anim.Parent = hulaDancer
    
    table.insert(HulaDancers, hulaDancer)
end

local function SpawnLeiStand()
    local leiStand = Instance.new("Part")
    leiStand.Name = "LeiStand"
    leiStand.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
    leiStand.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-20, 20), 0, math.random(-20, 20))
    leiStand.Anchored = true
    
    -- Add leis to the lei stand    
    for i = 1, 5 do        
        local lei = Instance.new("MeshPart")
        lei.MeshId = "rbxassetid://345678901" -- Replace with your mesh ID    
        lei.Parent = leiStand    
    end
    
    table.insert(LeiStands, leiStand)
end

local function UpdateScore(player, scoreDelta)
    local playerData = Scoreboard:FindFirstChild(player.UserId)
    if not playerData then return end
    
    playerData.Score.Value += scoreDelta
    
    -- Broadcast updated scores to all players    
    HttpService:JSONEncode({
        ["MessageType"] = "UpdateScores",
        ["Scores"] = {
            [player.UserId] = playerData.Score.Value,
        }
    })
end

-- // SCRIPT \\ --

-- Initialize the Luau Island    
LuauIsland.Parent = Workspace

-- // Variables \\ --

-- Game State --
local gameState = "Idle"

-- NPC's --
local npcHulaGirl = workspace.NPCs.HulaGirl:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart").Parent

-- Treasure Hunt --
local treasurePositions = {
    Vector3.new(10, 5, 20),
    Vector3.new(-15, 3, -10),
    Vector3.new(25, 2, 30)
}
local treasureFound = {false, false, false}

-- Activities --
local coconutTree = workspace.Activities.CoconutTree:FindFirstChild("TouchInterest")
local limboStick = workspace.Activities.LimboStick:FindFirstChild("Part")

-- UI Elements --
local luaUI = game.StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, true)

-- // Functions \\ --

-- Initialize Luau Event --
local function initLuauEvent()
    gameState = "Luau"
    luauStarted = true
    
    -- Spawn NPCs --
    npcHulaGirl.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 5    
    npcHulaGirl.Parent = workspace.NPCs.HulaGirl
    
    -- Create Treasure Chests --
    for i = 1, #treasurePositions do        
        local chest = Instance.new("Part")
        chest.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
        chest.Anchored = true        
        chest.Position = treasurePositions[i]        
        chest.Parent = workspace.Treasures
        
        local gui = Instance.new("BillboardGui")        
        gui.AlwaysOnTop = true        
        gui.Parent = chest
        
        local label = Instance.new("TextLabel")
        label.Text = "Treasure Chest ".. tostring(i)        
        label.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size14        
        label.Font = Enum.Font.SourceSansBold        
        label.Parent = gui        
    end
    
    -- Coconut Tree Activity --
    coconutTree.Parent = workspace.Activities.CoconutTree    
    local coconuts = {}
    for i = 1, 5 do        
        local coconut = Instance.new("MeshPart")
        coconut.MeshId = "rbxassetid://123456789"        
        coconut.Position = coconutTree.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)        
        coconut.Parent = coconutTree
        
        table.insert(coconuts, coconut)        
    end
    
    -- Limbo Stick Activity --
    limboStick.Parent = workspace.Activities.LimboStick    
end

-- Check if Player has found Treasure --
local function checkForTreasure(player, position)
    for i = 1, #treasurePositions do        
        if (position - treasurePositions[i]).Magnitude < 5 then            
            if not treasureFound[i] then                
                treasureFound[i] = true                
                player.Character.HumanoidRootPart.Transparency = 0.5                
                wait(2)                
                player.Character.HumanoidRootPart.Transparency = 0                
                print(player.Name.. " has found treasure ".. tostring(i))                
                return true            
            end            
        end        
    end    
    return false    
end

Here is an advanced Roblox Lua code for a Luau theme park attraction:
```lua

--// Services //--

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local Workspace = game:GetService("Workspace")
local ServerStorage = game:GetService("ServerStorage")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")

--// Variables //--

local Island = Workspace.Island -- the island object in the workspace

local Huts = {} -- table to store huts on the island

local Coconuts = {} -- table to store coconut objects

local PalmTrees = {} -- table to store palm tree objects

local Visitors = {} -- table to store player characters on the island

local CoconutPrice = 100 -- price of coconuts in robux

local HutBuildTime = 10 -- time in seconds to build a hut

local PalmTreeGrowTime = 5 -- time in seconds for palm trees to grow

--// Functions //--

local function SpawnCoconut(position)
    local coconutModel = ServerStorage.Coconut:Clone()
    coconutModel.Parent = IslandSurface -- parent to the island surface
    
    -- set coconut properties    
    coconutModel.Position = position
    
    table.insert(Coconuts, coconutModel) -- add coconut to table
    
    return coconutModel -- return coconut object
    
end

local function BuildHut(playerCharacter, position)
    local hutModel = ServerStorage.Hut:Clone()
    hutModel.Parent = IslandSurface -- parent to the island surface
    
    -- set hut properties    
    hutModel.Position = position
    
    table.insert(Huts, hutModel) -- add hut to table
    
    local buildTween = TweenService:Create(hutModel, TweenInfo.new(HutBuildTime, Enum.EaseType.Quint), { Transparency = 0 })
    buildTween:Play() -- play build animation
    
    -- give player ownership of hut    
    hutModel:SetAttribute("Owner", playerCharacter.UserId)
    
    return hutModel -- return hut object
    
end

local function GrowPalmTree(position)
    local palmTreeModel = ServerStorage.PalmTree:Clone()
    palmTreeModel.Parent = IslandSurface -- parent to the island surface
    
    -- set palm tree properties    
    palmTreeModel.Position = position
    
    table.insert(PalmTrees, palmTreeModel) -- add palm tree to table
    
    local growTween = TweenService:Create(palmTreeModel, TweenInfo.new(PalmTreeGrowTime, Enum.EaseType.Quint), { Transparency = 0 })
    growTween:Play() -- play grow animation
    
    return palmTreeModel -- return palm tree object
    
end

local function GetClosestCoconut(playerPosition)
    local closestCoconut = nil -- initialize closest coconut variable
    
    for _, coconut in pairs(Coconuts) do
        
        local distance = (coconut.Position - playerPosition).magnitude -- calculate distance from player to coconut
        
        if distance < 5 then -- check if coconut is within range
            
            if not closestCoconut or distance < (closestCoconut.Position - playerPosition).magnitude then
                
                closestCoconut = coconut -- update closest coconut
                
            end
            
        end
        
    end
    
    return closestCoconut -- return closest coconut
    
end

local function PickUpCoconut(player, coconut)
    -- remove coconut from table and parent    
    table.remove(Coconuts, coconut)
    coconut.Parent = nil
    
    -- add to player inventory    
    local playerInventory = player.Character:WaitForChild("Backpack").Inventory
    
    local coconutItem = Instance.new("Tool") -- create new tool instance for coconut
    
    coconutItem.Name = "Coconut"
    coconutItem.Parent = playerInventory
    
    -- award robux for picking up coconut

Here's an advanced Roblox Lua script for a Luau game that features a tropical island with interactive elements, a scoring system, and a variety of minigames:

-- Configuration --
local Island = workspace.Island -- The island model in the workspace

-- Minigame controllers --
local CoconutThrowController = require(script.CoconutThrowController)
local LimboStickController = require(script.LimboStickController)
local HulaHoopController = require(script.HulaHoopController)

-- Scoring system --
local scoreService = game:GetService("ScoreService")
local scores = {}

-- Function to reset the island --
local function ResetIsland()
    -- Remove all players and their characters from the island --
    for _, player in pairs(game.Players:GetPlayers()) do 
        if player.Character then 
            player.Character:Destroy() 
        end 
    end 

    -- Reset all interactive elements on the island --
    for _, element in pairs(Island:GetDescendants()) do 
        if element:IsA("BasePart") or element:IsA("MeshPart") then 
            element.Anchored = true 
        elseif element:IsA("ParticleEmitter") then 
            element.Enabled = false 
        elseif element:IsA("Sound") then 
            element:Stop() 
        elseif element:IsA("ProximityPrompt") then 
            element:Destroy() 
        end 
    end 

    -- Reset scores --
    for _, score in pairs(scores) do 
        score.Value = 0 
    end 
end 

-- Function to handle player spawn --
local function OnPlayerSpawn(player) 
    -- Create a new character for the player and parent it to the island --
    local character = Instance.new("Model")
    character.Parent = Island

    -- Add a HumanoidRootPart to the character --
    local humanoidRootPart = Instance.new("HumanoidRootPart")
    humanoidRootPart.Parent = character

    -- Add a humanoid to the character --
    local humanoid = Instance.new("Humanoid")
    humanoid.Parent = character

    -- Set up the player's scores --
    local score = Instance.new("IntValue", scoreService)
    score.Name = "Score"
    score.Parent = scoreService

    -- Initialize the player's score to 0 --
    score.Value = 0 

    table.insert(scores, score)

    -- Update the player's scoreboard display --
    local scoreboard = player.PlayerGui:FindFirstChild("Scoreboard")
    if scoreboard then 
        scoreboard.TextLabel.Text = "Score: 0" 
    end 
end 

-- Connect events --
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(OnPlayerSpawn)
game.Players.PlayerRemoving:Connect(function(player) 
    -- Clean up the player's data when they leave the game --
    for i, score in ipairs(scores) do 
        if score.Name == player.UserId then 
            table.remove(scores, i) 
            break 
        end 
    end 
end)

Here's an advanced Roblox Lua script for a tropical island-themed game, as requested:

```lua

-- Configuration Variables --

local GameName = "Tropical Island Survival"
local Version = "1.0"

-- Services --
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local ServerScriptService = game:GetService("ServerScriptService")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")

-- Modules --
local Utils = require(ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("Utils"))

-- Table of Resources --
local Resources = {
    Food = {
        Pineapple = {name = "Pineapple", amount = 10, hungerRestore = 20},
        Coconut = {name = "Coconut", amount = 5, hungerRestore = 15},
        Fish = {name = "Fish", amount = 3, hungerRestore = 30}
    },
    Water = {
        CoconutWater = {name = "Coconut Water", amount = 5, thirstRestore = 25},
        SpringWater = {name = "Spring Water", amount = 10, thirstRestore = 35}
    },
    Shelters = {
        PalmTreeShelter = {name = "Palm Tree Shelter", protection = 10},
        Tent = {name = "Tent", protection = 20}
    }
}

-- Player Data Table --
local PlayerData = {}

-- Main Function --
function onPlayerSpawned(player)
    -- Initialize player data --
    local character = player.Character or player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
    local humanoid = character.Humanoid
    
    -- Assign starting resources --
    PlayerData[player.UserId] = {
        Hunger = 50,
        Thirst = 50,
        Health = 100,
        Resources = {
            Food = {},
            Water = {},
            Shelters = {}
        }
    }
    
    -- Spawn player at random location on the island --
    local spawnLocations = game.Workspace:Island.SpawnLocations:GetChildren()
    local randomIndex = math.random(1, #spawnLocations)
    local spawnLocation = spawnLocations[randomIndex]
    character:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(spawnLocation.CFrame)
    
    -- Create player GUI --
    local playerGui = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")
    local guiResources = playerGui.Resources
    
    -- Update GUI resources in real-time --
    while true do 
        wait(0.1) 
        guiResources.Food.Text = "Food: ".. table.concat(PlayerData[player.UserId].Resources.Food, ", ")
        guiResources.Water.Text = "Water: ".. table.concat(PlayerData[player.UserId].Resources.Water, ", ")
        guiResources.Shelters.Text = "Shelters: ".. table.concat(PlayerData[player.UserId].Resources.Shelters, ", ")
    end
    
    -- Listen for player interactions with resources --
    local function onResourceInteracted(resourceName, resourceType)
        local resource = Resources[resourceType][resourceName]
        
        if resource then 
            -- Add resource to player inventory --
            table.insert(PlayerData[player.UserId].Resources[resourceType], resourceName)
            
            -- Update player stats accordingly --
            if resourceType == "Food" then 
                PlayerData[player.UserId].Hunger = math.clamp(PlayerData[player.UserId].Hunger + resource.hungerRestore, 0, 100)
            elseif resourceType == "Water" then 
                PlayerData[player.UserId].Thirst = math.clamp(PlayerData[player.UserId].Thirst + resource.thirstRestore, 0, 100)
            else 
                PlayerData[player.UserId].Health = math.clamp(PlayerData[player.UserId].Health + resource.protection, 0, 100)

Here is an advanced Roblox Lua script that creates a fully functional Luau game with various features:

**Luau Game Code**
```lua

-- Define constants and variables

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ServerScriptService = game:GetService("ServerScriptService")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")

local LUAIMAGES = {
    "rbxassetid://1234567890", -- Coconut tree image ID 
    "rbxassetid://2345678901", -- Palm tree image ID 
    "rbxassetid://3456789012"  -- Beach ball image ID 
}

local LUALOCATIONS = {
    Vector3.new(10, 0, -5),   -- Spawn point for players on the beach 
    Vector3.new(-5, 0, 10)   -- Spawn point for players in the jungle 
}

local LUAAWARDS = {
    {name = "Coconut Crown", id = "rbxassetid://4567890123"}, 
    {name = "Palm Leaf Hat", id = "rbxassetid://5678901234"}, 
    {name = "Beach Ball Trophy", id = "rbxassetid://6789012345"}  
}

local luaDataStore = {}

-- Create game objects and GUI elements

local guiFolder = Instance.new("Folder")
guiFolder.Parent = game.Players.LocalPlayer.PlayerGui

local coconutTreeImageLabel = Instance.new("ImageLabel")
coconutTreeImageLabel.Image = LUAIMAGES[1]
coconutTreeImageLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 100, 0, 100)
coconutTreeImageLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0, 50, 0, 200)
coconutTreeImageLabel.Parent = guiFolder

local palmTreeImageLabel = Instance.new("ImageLabel")
palmTreeImageLabel.Image = LUAIMAGES[2]
palmTreeImageLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 100, 0, 100)
palmTreeImageLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0, 150, 0, 250)
palmTreeImageLabel.Parent = guiFolder

local beachBallImageLabel = Instance.new("ImageLabel")
beachBallImageLabel.Image = LUAIMAGES[3]
beachBallImageLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 100, 0, 100)
beachBallImageLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0, 250, 0, 300)
beachBallImageLabel.Parent = guiFolder

-- Define player spawn function

local function spawnPlayer(player)
    local character = player.Character or player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
    character.HumanoidRootPart.CFrame = LUALOCATIONS[math.random(1, #LUALOCATIONS)]
end

-- Define award giving function

local function giveAward(player, awardId)
    local award = Instance.new("Tool")
    award.Name = LUAAWARDS[awardId].name.. " ( Awarded )"
    award.Parent = player.Backpack
    
    -- Add sound effect when award is given 
    local sound = Instance.new("Sound")
    sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://7890123456"
    sound.Volume = 10 
    sound:Play()
end

```lua

-- // SERVICES \\ --

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local ServerScriptService = game:GetService("ServerScriptService")
local Workspace = game:GetService("Workspace")

-- // VARIABLES \\ --

local COCONUT_COVE_LUAU_FESTIVAL = {
    LuauHut = Workspace.LuauHut,
    PalmTrees = Workspace.PalmTrees,
    CoconutStands = Workspace.CoconutStands,
    MusicStage = Workspace.MusicStage,
    DanceFloor = Workspace.DanceFloor,
    PlayerList = {}
}

local PLAYER_INFO = {
    [1] = {Name = "Player1", Character = nil},
    [2] = {Name = "Player2", Character = nil},
    --... add more players here...
}

local COCONUT_PRICES = {
    FreshCoconuts = 50,
    CoconutWater = 20,
    CoconutMilk = 30,
    CoconutOil = 40,
}

local MUSIC_TRACKS = {
    ["IslandVibes"] = "rbxassetid://1234567890",
    ["CoconutGrove"] = "rbxassetid://2345678901",
    ["LuauFever"] = "rbxassetid://3456789012",
}

-- // FUNCTIONS \\ --

local function SpawnCharacter(player)
    local character = player.Character or player.CharacterAdded.Wait()
    if character then 
        character.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 
        character.Parent = COCONUT_COVE_LUAU_FESTIVAL.LuauHut 
    end 
end 

local function UpdatePlayerList() 
    COCONUT_COVE_LUAU_FESTIVAL.PlayerList = {} 
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do 
        table.insert(COCONUT_COVE_LUAU_FESTIVAL.PlayerList, player.Name) 
    end 
end 

local function PlayMusicTrack(trackName)
    local music = Instance.new("Sound")
    music.SoundId = MUSIC_TRACKS[trackName]
    music.Parent = COCONUT_COVE_LUAU_FESTIVAL.MusicStage 
    music:Play()
end 

local function SellCoconuts(player, coconutType)
    local playerInfo = PLAYER_INFO[player.UserId]
    if playerInfo and COCONUT_PRICES[coconutType] then 
        local cost = COCONUT_PRICES[coconutType] 
        if playerInfo.Coconuts >= cost then 
            playerInfo.Coconuts -= cost 
            local coconutItem = Instance.new("Part") 
            coconutItem.Name = coconutType 
            coconutItem.Anchored = true 
            coconutItem.Parent = player.Backpack 
            print(player.Name.. " bought a ".. coconutType.. " for ".. cost.. " coconuts!")

Here is an advanced Roblox Lua script for a Luau game, a tropical-themed party game with various features:

**Luau Game Script**
```lua

-- Configuration

local GAME_NAME = "Tropical Luau"
local MAX_PLAYERS = 20

-- Services

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ServerScriptService = game:GetService("ServerScriptService")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")

-- Variables

local playersInGame = {}
local currentParty = {}
local musicPlayer = nil

-- Functions

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
    table.insert(playersInGame, player.UserId)
end

local function onPlayerRemoved(player)
    for i, v in pairs(playersInGame) do 
        if v == player.UserId then 
            table.remove(playersInGame, i)
            return 
        end 
    end 
end 

local function createParty()
    local partyFolder = Instance.new("Folder", workspace)
    partyFolder.Name = "Party"
    
    -- Create Party Decorations
    
    local palmTrees = {}
    for i = 1, 5 do 
        local palmTree = Instance.new("Part")
        palmTree.Anchored = true 
        palmTree.Position = Vector3.new( math.random(-10, 10), 0, math.random(-10, 10))
        palmTree.Parent = partyFolder
        
        table.insert(palmTrees, palmTree)
    end 
    
    -- Create Music Player
    
    musicPlayer = Instance.new("Sound")
    musicPlayer.SoundId = "rbxassetid://123456789" -- Replace with your own sound asset ID
    
    musicPlayer.Looped = true 
    musicPlayer.Parent = partyFolder
    
    -- Create Food and Drinks
    
    local foodFolder = Instance.new("Folder", partyFolder)
    foodFolder.Name = "Food"
    
    local drinksFolder = Instance.new("Folder", partyFolder)
    drinksFolder.Name = "Drinks"
    
    for i = 1, 5 do 
        local foodItem = Instance.new("Part")
        foodItem.Anchored = true 
        foodItem.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-5, 5), 0, math.random(-5, 5))
        foodItem.Parent = foodFolder
        
        local drinkItem = Instance.new("Part")
        drinkItem.Anchored = true 
        drinkItem.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-5, 5), 0, math.random(-5, 5))
        drinkItem.Parent = drinksFolder 
    end 
end

local function startParty()
    createParty()
    
    musicPlayer:Play()
    
    for _, player in pairs(playersInGame) do 
        local character = Players:GetPlayerByUserId(player).Character
        
        if character then 
            character.HumanoidRootPart.Anchored = true 
            character.HumanoidRootPart.Position = Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)
        end 
    end 
end

-- Event Listeners

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)
Players.PlayerRemoving:Connect(onPlayerRemoved)

-- Startup

startParty()

-- HTTP Request Handler

HttpService.HttpEnabled = true

local function onRequest(req)
    if req.Method == "GET" then 
        if req.Query["action"] == "joinParty" then 
            local userId = tonumber(req.Query["userId"])
            
            if userId then 
                local player = Players:GetPlayerByUserId(userId)
                
                if player then 
                    table.insert(currentParty, player)
                    
                    startParty()
                else 
                    return "Error: Player not found."
